channel.title: Lvl help
channel.description:
i need help making it so it is really hard to grow lvls
+ also i need help with making it so when you hit dummys you grow your att lvl to 50 + closing door at dummys and then you grow your strenth lvl to 50 + hitting hay to make defense to lvl 50
i need help with these to things

item.title: Lvl help
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“gamma, post:2, topic:238418”]if you want hard training then why do you want hitting dummys to get you up 50 lvls

and for tough training try a devolution source, or richscape v2 or something… or to edit the exprate its in client.java

o have richscape v4 source so my client.java is different try searching something like

exprate

getting a new source because of a simple change?!?!?

oh no i want a different start up message...i need a new source.

That’s pretty much what your saying.

Read full topic
